English.Text: Getting a ship over a hill is mad, but it works. "Is this absolutely necessary?" muses Mr. Cardinale having watched the crew slip for a week in mud. But the rolling timbers and makeshift winches they have crafted prove adequate, and the ship finally scrapes down the other side, into the upper river. Mr. Cardinale barely offers a word of thanks, perturbed perhaps, by the indignity of it all.
